0: AN ACT INCREASING THE MINIMUM SALARIES OF PUBLIC SCHOOL TEACHERS AND OTHER GOVERNMENT EMPLOYEES AND AUGMENTING THE PERSONNEL ECONOMIC RELIEF ALLOWANCE

history:
House Bill/Resolution NO. HB00056
FULL TITLE : AN ACT INCREASING THE MINIMUM SALARIES OF PUBLIC SCHOOL TEACHERS AND OTHER GOVERNMENT EMPLOYEES AND AUGMENTING THE PERSONNEL ECONOMIC RELIEF ALLOWANCE
ABSTRACT : Increase the minimum salaries of public school teachers and all other government employees and to increase also the Personnel Economic Relief Allowance (PERA) granted to all government employees.
PRINCIPAL AUTHOR/S : TINIO, ANTONIO L., CASTRO, FRANCE L., CASILAO, ARIEL "KA AYIK" B.
DATE FILED : 2016-06-30
SIGNIFICANCE: NATIONAL
NATURE : Reform
